name: Ceviche
keywords: appetizer, fish, lime juice, tomato, low-fat, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 pound skinless, boneless fillets of fish such as bluefish, red snapper, mackerel or seafood such as bay scallops
1 cup peeled, seeded, fresh, red, ripe tomatoes cut into 1/4-inch cubes and drained
4 or more canned serrano chilies, drained and chopped
1/2 cup avocado cut into small cubes
1/4 cup finely diced heart of celery

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the fish into cubes of about one-half inch in diameter. If bay scallops are used, cut them into quarters. Put the pieces in a bowl and add the lime juice. Cover and refrigerate, stirring occasionally, 12 hours or longer.
Add the remaining ingredients and chill until ready to serve
